articles.author: Liverpool FC
articles.title: Jürgen Klopp pays tribute to Franz Beckenbauer - Liverpool FC
articles.description: Jürgen Klopp has paid tribute to Franz Beckenbauer following the passing of the legendary former player and coach.
articles.content:
Jürgen, we are speaking after the very sad news of Franz Beckenbauers passing. Firstly, can you tell us your reflections on the news, please?
Yeah, yesterday was a very sad day when I got the news a… [+5275 chars]
